name: Close Your Eyes -Anniversary Remake-
description: Are you seeing clearly? This is a complete remake of the uprising cult hit about an adorable murderer bound by their past, brought into question by a strange game show host. Experience an atmospheric descent where not everything is as it seems, redone with brand new content and reimagined scenarios.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display
